name: Catch 50 Sharks
description: Fish 50 raw sharks.

name: Smith 100 Mithril Dart Tips
description: Smith 100 mithril dart tips from mithril bars.

name: Complete a Farm Run (Herbs)
description: Harvest herbs from at least 3 different herb patches.

name: Defeat a Skeletal Wyvern
description: Kill one Skeletal Wyvern in the Asgarnian Ice Dungeon.

name: Fletch 250 Maple Longbows (u)
description: Fletch 250 unstrung maple longbows.

name: Superheat 50 Gold Ores
description: Use the Superheat Item spell to create 50 gold bars.

name: Complete a Hard Clue Scroll
description: Complete all steps of a hard tier clue scroll.

name: Pickpocket a Hero
description: Successfully pickpocket a Hero in Ardougne.

name: Craft 50 Chaos Runes
description: Craft 50 chaos runes at the altar.

name: Kill a Kurask
description: Kill one Kurask in the Fremennik or Iorwerth Slayer Dungeon.

name: Obtain a piece of the Pyromancer outfit
description: Receive any piece of the Pyromancer outfit from a Wintertodt supply crate.

name: Defeat the King Black Dragon
description: Kill the King Black Dragon in his lair.

name: Create a batch of 100 cannonballs
description: Smelt 100 cannonballs at any furnace.

name: Catch 10 Red Chinchompas
description: Catch 10 Red Chinchompas.

name: Complete a game of Soul Wars
description: Finish a full game of Soul Wars and obtain Zeal Points.

name: Mix a Super Restore Potion
description: Create a 4-dose Super Restore potion.

name: Defeat a Brutal Black Dragon
description: Kill one Brutal Black Dragon in the Catacombs of Kourend.

name: Enchant a Diamond Amulet
description: Enchant a diamond amulet into an Amulet of Power.

name: Chop 100 Teak Logs
description: Chop 100 teak logs on Ape Atoll or Fossil Island.

name: Kill a Dust Devil
description: Kill a Dust Devil in the Catacombs of Kourend or Smoke Dungeon.

name: Bury 50 Dragon Bones
description: Bury 50 Dragon Bones at any location.

name: Catch 25 Monkfish
description: Catch 25 raw monkfish.

name: Complete a Slayer Task from Nieve/Steve
description: Get and complete any slayer task from Nieve or Steve.

name: Smith an Adamant Platebody
description: Smith an adamant platebody from scratch.

name: Craft 100 Law Runes
description: Craft 100 law runes via the Abyss.

name: Defeat the Giant Mole
description: Kill the Giant Mole in the Falador Mole Lair.

name: Steal from a Knight of Ardougne
description: Successfully pickpocket a Knight of Ardougne.

name: Mine 25 Adamantite Ore
description: Mine 25 adamantite ore.

name: Burn 100 Yew Logs
description: Burn 100 yew logs.

name: Obtain 50 Golden Nuggets
description: Earn 50 golden nuggets from the Motherlode Mine.

name: Fletch a Magic Longbow
description: Fletch and string a magic longbow.

name: Create a Super Attack Potion (4)
description: Create a 4-dose super attack potion.

name: Fish a Leaping Sturgeon
description: Catch a leaping sturgeon using a barbarian rod.

name: Complete a Temple Trek
description: Successfully guide a follower through the Burgh de Rott Ramble.

name: Defeat a Fossil Island Wyvern
description: Kill any type of Wyvern on Fossil Island.

name: Smith a Rune Scimitar
description: Smith a rune scimitar from a runite bar.

name: Charge an Amulet of Glory
description: Charge an Amulet of Glory at the Fountain of Rune.

name: Defeat a Saradomin Wizard
description: Defeat a Saradomin Wizard at the Saradomin Statue in the Wilderness.

name: Create a full set of Green d'hide
description: Craft the body, chaps, and vambs.

name: Catch 50 Karambwans
description: Catch 50 raw Karambwans.

name: Complete a game of Pest Control
description: Successfully complete a veteran game of Pest Control.

name: Kill a Maniacal Monkey
description: Kill a Maniacal Monkey in Kruk's Dungeon.

name: Obtain Full Angler's Outfit
description: Collect all four pieces of the Angler's outfit from Fishing Trawler.

name: Defeat Vorkath
description: Kill the Dragon Slayer II boss, Vorkath.

name: Equip a Trident of the Seas
description: Obtain and equip a Trident of the Seas.

name: Complete a full God Wars Dungeon kill
description: Kill any of the four main God Wars Dungeon bosses.

name: Obtain an Imbued God Cape
description: Complete Mage Arena II and imbue any god cape.

name: Defeat Zulrah
description: Kill the solo snake boss, Zulrah.

name: Obtain a Dragon Harpoon
description: Receive a Dragon Harpoon as a drop from Wyrms.

name: Complete an Elite Clue Scroll
description: Complete all steps of an elite tier clue scroll.

name: Equip an Avernic Defender
description: Obtain an avernic defender hilt from the Theatre of Blood and combine it.

name: Defeat The Gauntlet
description: Successfully complete a run of The Gauntlet in Prifddinas.

name: Obtain a piece of Barrows Equipment
description: Receive any piece of Barrows armour or a weapon from the chest.

name: Equip a full set of Obsidian Armour
description: Equip the Obsidian platebody, platelegs, and helmet.

name: Defeat the Chaos Elemental
description: Kill the Chaos Elemental in the Wilderness.

name: Obtain a Tome of Fire
description: Receive a Tome of Fire from a supply crate at Wintertodt.

name: Equip a full set of Elite Void
description: Upgrade a full set of regular void to its elite version.

name: Defeat Callisto
description: Kill the bear boss in the Wilderness.

name: Defeat Venenatis
description: Kill the spider boss in the Wilderness.

name: Defeat Vet'ion
description: Kill the skeleton boss in the Wilderness.

name: Obtain a Dragon Pickaxe
description: Receive a Dragon Pickaxe as a drop from any of the Wilderness bosses.

name: Equip a full set of Dragon Armour (g)
description: Equip a full set of gold-trimmed dragon armour (platebody, platelegs/skirt, full helm).

name: Receive a Zenyte shard
description: Kill a Demonic Gorilla and receive a Zenyte shard.

name: Obtain a Dragon Warhammer
description: Receive a Dragon Warhammer as a drop from Lizardman Shamans.

name: Receive any Boss Pet
description: Obtain a pet from any boss in the game.

name: Complete the Corrupted Gauntlet
description: Successfully complete a run of the Corrupted Gauntlet.

name: Obtain a Spectral Sigil
description: Receive a Spectral Sigil as a drop from the Corporeal Beast.

name: Obtain a piece of Ancestral
description: Receive any piece of the Ancestral robes set from the Chambers of Xeric.

name: Complete a no-food Fight Caves run
description: Obtain a Fire Cape without consuming any food.

name: Obtain a Twisted Buckler
description: Receive a Twisted Buckler as a drop from the Chambers of Xeric.

name: Obtain a Jar of Darkness
description: Receive a Jar of Darkness as a drop from Skotizo.

name: Equip a full set of 3rd Age Armour
description: Equip a matching set of any 3rd Age melee, ranged, or magic armour.

name: Obtain a Smouldering Stone
description: Receive a Smouldering Stone as a drop from Cerberus or Hellhounds.

name: Obtain an Elysian Sigil
description: Receive an Elysian Sigil as a drop from the Corporeal Beast.

name: Complete a Master Clue Scroll
description: Complete all steps of a Master tier clue scroll.

name: Obtain a Scythe of Vitur
description: Receive a Scythe of Vitur as a drop from the Theatre of Blood.

name: Obtain a Tumeken's Shadow
description: Receive a Tumeken's Shadow as a drop from the Tombs of Amascut.
